net.bubbaland.trivia

Class Trivia

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bubbaland.trivia.Trivia
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Trivia
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The primary data structure for the trivia contest. The Trivia class holds all of the data for a trivia contest. There are a number of fields representing different parameters of the contest, and an array of Rounds that hold data for individual rounds.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setSpeed()
        Makes the current round a speed round.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(int rNumber)
        Makes a round a speed round.
        Parameters:
        rNumber - The round number

      • setStandings

        public void setStandings(int rNumber,
                ScoreEntry[] standings)
        Set the standings for a round.
        Parameters:
        rNumber - The round number
        standings - An array of ScoreEntry

      • unsetSpeed

        public void unsetSpeed()
        Make the current round a normal round.

      • unsetSpeed

        public void unsetSpeed(int rNumber)
        Make the round a normal round.
        Parameters:
        rNumber - The round number
